Interface IOtherModeGenerator

The transfergenerator takes a journey and a next connection. Using those, it extends the journey if this is possible.

Namespace: Itinero.Transit.Data.Walks
Assembly: Itinero.Transit.dll
Syntax
public interface IOtherModeGenerator

Methods

| Improve this Doc View Source

CreateArrivingTransfer<T>(Journey<T>, UInt64, (UInt32, UInt32))

Reverse add connection. Chains the transfer and connection to the given journey. However, this is the method to use for journeys which are built backwards in time

CreateDepartureTransfer<T>(Journey<T>, UInt64, (UInt32, UInt32))

Create a new journey, which extends 'buildOn' with 'nextConnection' This might return null if the transfer time is too short. This might involve querying for footpaths
